title: Thillu Mullu Thillu Mullu Lyrics Thillu Mullu 2 Songs Lyrics

Thillu Mullu thillu mullu
ullamellam kallu mullu

Life is thillu mullu 
you could see in my eyes
tell all to stay alive

coz am coming for your money
youll soon be mine

Vekkam illai thukkam illai
vesam oru dhosamillai (2)

I wake up in the morning
still asleep
My head banging like drum
from party last week
I told my boss that I'm sick
and ain't comming to work
thats why my mom and dad going to work
ha ha
and now we rolling rolling
check it out honey strolling strolling
now we pull out..baby
shopping central baby
this is what ..
am looking for 
whos having lot of money
so i could ..
now his lady come and ask me question
she needs parts.. hitching

 special fees for the question they ask
dont worry i gotch u
anything u want we got it at burma bazzaaru

Life is thillu mullu 
you could see in my eyes
tell all to stay alive
Life is thillu mullu 
where to go hide inside
coz am coming for your money
youll soon be mine

Thillu Mullu thillu mullu

ena valluvar sonnaar

oruvar thirudavum seidhaaru
